mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (role_id, user_id, password, email, name, birth, phone, nickname, is_block, register_datetime, modify_datetime, is_quit) VALUES (#{roleId}, #{userId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{nickname}, #{isBlock}, #{registerDatetime}, #{modifyDatetime}, #{isQuit})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_id = #{userId}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, name = #{name}, birth = #{birth}, phone = #{phone}, nickname = #{nickname}, modify_datetime = #{modifyDatetime} WHERE id = #{id}
